com.google.errorprone

Class ErrorProneCompiler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.errorprone.ErrorProneCompiler

  • public class ErrorProneCompiler
extends Object
    An error-prone compiler that matches the interface of Main. Used by plexus-java-compiler-errorprone.
    Author:
    alexeagle@google.com (Alex Eagle)

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Entry point for compiling Java code with error-prone enabled. All default checks are run, and the compile fails if they find a bug.
        Parameters:
        args - the same args which could be passed to javac on the command line

      • compile

        public static com.sun.tools.javac.main.Main.Result compile(DiagnosticListener<JavaFileObject> listener,
                                           String[] args)
        Compiles in-process.
        Parameters:
        listener - listens to the diagnostics produced by error-prone
        args - the same args which would be passed to javac on the command line
        Returns:
        result from the compiler invocation

        args - the same args which would be passed to javac on the command line

        result from the compiler invocation

      • compile

        public static com.sun.tools.javac.main.Main.Result compile(String[] args,
                                           PrintWriter out)
        Programmatic interface to the error-prone Java compiler.
        Parameters:
        args - the same args which would be passed to javac on the command line
        out - a PrintWriter to which to send diagnostic output
        Returns:
        result from the compiler invocation
